section.63: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas:I have never heard the Prophet (ï·º) saying about anybody walking on the earth that he is from the people of Paradise except `Abdullah bin Salam. The following Verse was revealed concerning him: "And a witness from the children of Israel testifies that this Qur'an is true
